songs.title: BAIN IS BACK
songs.lyrics:
Intro:

RUFF RYDERS

WHAT WHAT WHAT

[HOOK: SWIZZ BEATS]
La Familia
If it ain't about the dawg
We ain't feeling ya
Alot of rapper been soft for a long time
Bout to put the hoody on dawg all times
They said pain is back
Nah, BAIN IS BACK!
The dark knight.. with the hoody on missing
Gone through your block make all your niggas really missing
Where they at now?
You want that real shit don't ya?
You want that street shit dont ya?

[verse 1: DMX]
